props.heading: Leadership for Social Impact
props.content:
The organizations working to solve our world's most critical challenges‚Äîfrom poverty and education to climate change and health equity‚Äîoften have the greatest need for exceptional leadership but the least resources to access it. Our Pro Bono Services Initiative bridges this gap by providing the same high-quality executive search services to mission-driven organizations at no cost.

Why Pro Bono Matters

props.heading: Transforming Lives Through Leadership: A Pro Bono Success Story
props.content:
Scaling Education Access

How we helped an education non-profit expand from 500 to 50,000 students through strategic leadership placement.

The Challenge

  • ‚Ä¢ Small education NGO with proven model but limited reach
  • ‚Ä¢ Founder-CEO ready to transition to Board Chair role
  • ‚Ä¢ Need for experienced scaling executive with education passion
  • ‚Ä¢ Limited budget for executive search services
  • ‚Ä¢ Urgency to maintain momentum and donor confidence

Pro Bono Solution

  • ‚Ä¢ Full executive search at no cost to the organization
  • ‚Ä¢ Identified CEO with both scaling experience and education passion
  • ‚Ä¢ Conducted comprehensive reference checks and cultural fit assessment
  • ‚Ä¢ Provided 90-day integration support post-placement
  • ‚Ä¢ Connected new CEO with network of education sector leaders

props.heading: How to Apply for Pro Bono Services
props.content:
Pro Bono Application Process

1

Submit Application

Complete our pro bono service application with organization details and search requirements

2

Eligibility Review

Our team reviews your mission, impact, and organizational readiness for executive search

3

Partnership Agreement

Formalize the engagement with clear expectations and timeline for the search process

4

Executive Search

Full-service search including candidate identification, assessment, and placement support

We typically accept 15-20 pro bono engagements per year. Applications are reviewed quarterly.
